pages.text: This guide will teach you the basics of how to construct and modify buildings using $(thing)Timber Frames$().
The $(thing)Broad Knife$() is the tool you will use to alter $(thing)Timber Frames$() patterns and connections.

pages.heading: Right Clicking
pages.text: $(thing)Sneak right-click$() while holding broad knife to alter block placement selection. $(br2)$(thing)Right-click$() timber frame blocks to apply your selection.

pages.heading: Left Clicking
pages.text: $(thing)Sneak left-click$() while holding broad knife to alter block variant selection. $(br2)$(thing)Left-click$() timber frame blocks to apply your selection.
